description:
Ichigo battles Muramasa in order to save Head Captain Yamamoto from captivity. Meanwhile, Yoruichi, Shunsui, and Jushiro notice that the Zanpakuto are trying to prevent them from reaching Ichigo, and quickly realize that he was the key to Muramasa`s plan all along.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Damasareta Shinigami! Sekai Houkai no Kiki
Deceived Shinigami! The World Collapse Crisis
Les Shinigamis dupés ! La crise d`un monde qui s`effondre
騙された死神! 世界崩壊の危機
